content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to the latest information or updates. However, here are the schools under the University of North Carolina and the sports they offer:

1. Appalachian State University: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Wrestling, Volleyball, Tennis, Golf, Cross Country, Track & Field, Soccer, Softball, Field Hockey

2. East Carolina University: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Golf, Swimming & Diving, Cross Country, Track & Field, Soccer

3. Elizabeth City State University: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Cross Country, Track & Field

4. Fayetteville State University: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Cross Country, Track & Field

5. North Carolina A&T State University: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Bowling, Golf, Swimming & Diving, Cross Country, Track & Field

6. North Carolina Central University: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Bowling, Golf, Swimming & Diving, Cross Country, Track & Field

7. North Carolina State University: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Golf, Swimming & Diving, Cross Country, Track & Field, Wrestling, Soccer

8. UNC Asheville: Basketball, Volleyball, Tennis, Cross Country, Track & Field, Soccer

9. UNC Chapel Hill: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Golf, Swimming & Diving, Cross Country, Track & Field, Wrestling, Soccer, Field Hockey, Lacrosse, Gymnastics

10. UNC Charlotte: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Golf, Cross Country, Track & Field, Soccer

11. UNC Greensboro: Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Golf, Swimming & Diving, Cross Country, Track & Field, Soccer

12. UNC Pembroke: Football, Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Cross Country, Track & Field, Soccer

13. UNC Wilmington: Basketball, Baseball, Softball, Volleyball, Tennis, Golf, Swimming & Diving, Cross Country, Track & Field, Soccer
